moves.name: Acrobatics
moves.effect: If the user is not holding an item, this move's damage is doubled.

moves.name: Aerial Ace
moves.effect: This move cannot miss.

moves.name: Air Cutter
moves.effect: High critical hit ratio. Hits all adjacent opponents.

moves.name: Air Slash
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target Flinches.

moves.name: Bounce
moves.effect: The user bounces high into the air for one turn, becoming untargetable. It attacks on the second turn. On a hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Paralyzed.

moves.name: Brave Bird
moves.effect: The user takes recoil damage equal to one-third of the damage it deals.

moves.name: Defog
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Evasion by 1. Clears all hazards and screens from both sides of the field.

moves.name: Drill Peck
moves.effect: No additional effects.

moves.name: Feather Dance
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Strength by 2.

moves.name: Fly
moves.effect: The user flies high into the air for one turn, becoming untargetable. It attacks on the second turn. Can be used to travel to previously visited locations.

moves.name: Gust
moves.effect: Damage is doubled against targets using Fly or Bounce.

moves.name: Hurricane
moves.effect: High chance to miss. Hits all adjacent opponents. On a hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Confused. Cannot miss in Rain.

moves.name: Mirror Move
moves.effect: The user copies the last move used by the target and uses it as their own.

moves.name: Peck
moves.effect: No additional effects.

moves.name: Pluck
moves.effect: If the target is holding a Berry, the user steals it and eats it.

moves.name: Razor Wind
moves.effect: Requires one turn to charge. High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Roost
moves.effect: The user recovers half of its maximum HP. For the rest of the round, the user loses its Flying type.

moves.name: Sky Attack
moves.effect: Requires one turn to charge. High critical hit ratio. On a hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target Flinches.

moves.name: Sky Drop
moves.effect: The user takes the target into the air for one turn, making both untargetable. It drops the target on the second turn.

moves.name: Tailwind
moves.effect: For 4 rounds, the Dexterity of the user and its allies is doubled.

moves.name: Twister
moves.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. On a hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target Flinches. Damage is doubled against targets using Fly or Bounce.

moves.name: Wing Attack
moves.effect: No additional effects.
